Class employee

java.lang.Object
employee
Direct Known Subclasses:
manager, regularEmployee
abstract class employee extends Object
Represents an employee and its common features. Abstract class defines common features of an employee.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected String
    dateOfBirth
    The date of birth of the employee in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
    protected String
    dateOfStart
    The date when the employee started working in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
    protected String
    email
    The email address of the employee.
    protected String
    employee_id
    The unique id for the employee.
    protected String
    name
    The first name of the employee.
    protected String
    phoneNo
    The phone number of the employee, stored as a string.
    protected String
    role
    The role of the employee, e.g., manager, engineer, technician, or intern.
    protected String
    surname
    The last name of the employee.
    protected String
    username
    The username of the employee for login purposes.

  • Constructor Details

    • employee

      public employee(String employee_id, String username, String role, String name, String surname, String phoneNo, String dateOfBirth, String dateOfStart, String email)
      Constructor for employee class.
      Parameters:
      employee_id - The identifier for the employee.
      username - The unique username of the employee.
      role - The role of the employe (manager, engineer, technician, intern)
      name - The name of the employee.
      surname - The surname of the employee.
      phoneNo - The phone number of the employee.
      dateOfBirth - The birth date of the employee (YYYY-MM-DD).
      dateOfStart - The start date of the employee (YYY-MM-DD).
      email - The email adress of the employee.

  • Method Details

    • defaultPasswordChange

      public void defaultPasswordChange()
      Allows user to change the password after first login. Checks if the user's password is default password ("password123") if the user's password is default, user will change their password.

    • displayProfile

      protected void displayProfile()
      Prints the profile information of the user in a table format. Informations include: Employee ID Username Role Name Surname Phone Number Date of Birth Date of Start Email

    • updateProfile

      protected void updateProfile()
      Allows user to update their profile informations. The user can choose one field to update or go back on menu: Password Phone Number Email Go back If the user's input is valid, the selected field will be updated. If the user's input is invalid, system will ask another input. The user can choose to change another field to update or exit the menu.

    • checkUser

      public boolean checkUser(String username)
      Check the user's username if it exist in the database.
      Parameters:
      username - The unique username to check in database.
      Returns:
      true if the username exits on database, false if the username does not exist.
